rule_optimizer module¶

rule_optimizer.arg_parser()¶

Function to parse command line arguments.

Returns

parsed arguments

Return type

namespace

rule_optimizer.optimize_rules(instance, program, fp_max, fn_max)¶

Optimizes rules according to ASP constraints.

Parameters

  • instance (str) – instance

  • program (str) – program

  • fp_max (int) – upper bound on false positives

  • fn_max (int) – upper bound on false negatives

Runs the training of classifiers.
